abstract.t: This document reproduces the content of the ITU-T Study Group 16White Document draft of H.248 Annex J, which is scheduled fordecision in Geneva in November 2000. H.248 Annex J provides theDynamic Tone Generation package.This document is submitted for IETF comment prior to ITU-T decision,in accordance with procedures currently being negotiated betweenITU-T Study Group and ISOC on behalf of the IETF.
